roleset.name: rigidly enforcing the rules

role.descr: entity subject to the rules, enforcement

example.name: strict-j: arg0
example.text: lthough other companies pay off the money several times slower than they do -LRB- usually one week -RRB- , for the materials and procedures of the compensation claims , they consider the inconvenience for the car owners , and they are not so strict .

example.name: strict-j: all args
example.text: She was very strict with him about eating regularly

example.name: strict-j: args 0, 2
example.text: Pingan is the most calculating -- they will avoid compensating if they can ; they will under - compensate if they can ; they are the most strict with identifications and documents ; their company has a strict management system .

example.name: stricter-j: arg2
example.text: The new traffic regulations are stricter

roleset.note: STRICT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from strict.01-j)
